page.title: 05 AMENITIES IN BRUTON AREA.
page.content: Many new houses have been built in the area,mainly in the nearby settlement of Castle Cary.Although we have these new estates,we are lacking in suitable amenities.We need to have a recreation centre, to include sports and music and a general youth club's facilities. There are plenty of schools in the area and we are able to use their facilities. The farmers in the area have modernised their methods,but much else is still quite traditional. The shops are many and small and are behind in sales,compared to a large urban environment.Most jobs in the area are inherited and it is not easy for newcomers to find work.Most employment is in agriculture.It is a traditional area and happy for this.
